bill_title: require mental health evaluations for inpatient treatment of controlled substance use.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to require mental health evaluations for inpatient treatment of controlled substance use. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: Mental health evaluations must be provided for certain persons.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
